name: Samsung Acclaim™
description: At last, a phone as unique and distinctive as you: The Samsung Acclaim™ is powered by Android™ 2.1 (a first for U.S. Cellular), so you can customize it to make it more “you”. Start with any of the over 48,000 apps available through Android Market. It also features a brilliant 3.2" touchscreen and full QWERTY keyboard – surf the Web, navigate the world with Google Maps and manage work emails. You can also update your Facebook status, snap 3.0MP pictures, text friends, download videos, and do it all with distinction.
additionalFeatures:
3.2" HVGA touchscreen with sliding QWERTY keyboard
AndroidTM 2.1 (Eclair)
3.0 Camera/Camcorder with LED flash
Full HTML Browser
Stereo Bluetooth Capable
Video and Music Player
